QuestData.Title: Onward and Inward
QuestData.Description: "Sha" energy, hm? Tread carefully, $n - there's a hidden darkness to this continent.$b$bWe'll stay behind to mop up the rest of the Horde, but we need you to continue with the main mission: the rescue of Captain Taylor, and the retrieval of Prince Anduin.$b$bOur aerial scouts think we've found the wreckage of the flagship near Paw'don Village. Go there and report to Admiral Rogers for instructions.$b$bYou are welcome to use my gyrocopter.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Admiral Rogers at Paw'don Village in the Jade Forest.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent work, $c. I can see why you came so highly recommended.
